# Erc721Mintable class

Mint ERC721 NFTs

## Example

```javascript
const contract = await sdk.getContract("{{contract_address}}");
await contract.nft.mint.to(walletAddress, nftMetadata);
```

## Remarks

NFT minting functionality that handles IPFS storage for you.
